description: Listen to articles, PDFs, emails, etc. in your podcast app or browser. Ultra-realistic AI voices. Read while you exercise, cook, commute, and do other things.
title: Audioread: Read in Audio
introduction: Audioread is a tool that uses AI to convert text into audio, allowing users to listen to articles, PDFs, emails, and more in their podcast player or browser. It offers features like ultra-realistic text-to-speech engine, converting text into audio on any device, and listening in any podcast app.
features: Convert text into audio on any device
targetPeople: People who want to listen to articles, PDFs, emails, and other text content on the go or while multitasking.
pricing: $9.99 per month for Audioread Monthly plan with features like 100,000 words per conversion, 500,000 words per day, and support for 77 languages.

faqs.question: Can I use Audioread without installing a podcast app?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can use the web app to convert text to audio and listen online without needing a podcast app.

faqs.question: What is the pricing for Audioread Monthly?
faqs.answer: The pricing for Audioread Monthly is $9.99 per month.
